author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: India holds lights-off vigil as Modi calls for unity
description: PM Narendra Modi urges Indians to "challenge the darkness", but critics dismiss the vigil as a stunt.
content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 India's prime minister called on the country to "challenge the darkness" of coronavirus
Indians have turned off their lights for a nationwide candle-lit vigil, heeding a call for unity as the country battles coronavirus.… [+2143 chars]
